entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
